title: Are smartphones the most powerful (specs-wise) handheld consoles available today? - Quora

response.answer_text: The GPD Win Max still blows any smartphone specs available, and it's currently the most powerful “handheld” out there.  Core specs: Intel Core i5-1035G7 (4 cores)Intel Iris Plus Graphics 94016 GB LPDDR4-3200512 GB M.2 2280 SSD
